Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch by rotating it according to the euler angles of the coordinate system and translating it according to the translation vector of the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction to a depth of 0.0268, and opposite normal direction to a depth of 0.0.
